text: After filing for divorce from Hank Baskett, Kendra Wilkinson is finding support in some unlikely friends. Less than a week after filing for divorce from her husband - of - eight - years, the 32 - year - old Kendra on Top star was “ getting back to being Kdub ” by finding support in a group of famous friends, including the cast of Jersey Shore and Tori Spelling. “ So thankful for friends right now,'' Wilkinson wrote on an Instagram post on Tuesday, which included a series of pictures and videos of her day out. “ Laughter is the best medicine and yesterday i overdosed. [ Laugh out loud ]. Getting back to being Kdub again [ and ] feels good.'' The former Playboy model and reality television personality spent the day clinking wine glasses with the
